## Overview

This path involves:

1. Purchasing the hardware components
2. Assembling the hardware
3. Flashing Home Assistant OS
4. Configuring the CAN HAT
5. First boot & initial setup
6. Installing the LibreCoach add-on

Total cost: Approximately $250-300 depending on hardware choices.

## Next Steps

Once you have your hardware, proceed to the [Hardware Guide](/build/hardware/).

Alternatively, if you already have your hardware, you can jump straight to:

- [Software Installation](/build/software/) - Flash HAOS and install LibreCoach
- [Hardware Assembly](/build/assembly/) - Step-by-step assembly instructions

:::tip
Already have your hardware? Jump straight to the [software guide](/build/software/).
:::
